title: Verification VERIFY Verify passed-in PIN data; command per ISO/IEC

container-title: REQUIREMENT DISABLE VERIFICATION Enable PIN queries; optional command per ISO/IEC 7816-8. REQUIREMENT CHANGE REFERENCE DATA Change the PIN; command per ISO/IEC
title: ENABLE VERIFICATION Enable PIN queries; optional command per ISO/IEC 7816-8
RESET RETRY COUNTER Reset the retry counter; command per ISO/IEC

note: command per ISO/IEC 7816-8.
title: Cryptographic operations MANAGE SECURITY Modify the parameters for using cryptographic algorithms in ENVIRONMENT the smart card
PERFORM SECURITY Run a cryptographic algorithm in the smart card; command per OPERATION
ASK RANDOM Request a random number from the smart card; command per ISO/IEC
